name: Route optimization
description: Calculate fastest driving, cycling, walking or multimodal public transportation route between locations

api_methods.name: Route and directions
api_methods.description: Calculate route between provided waypoints, including turn by turn directions

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: Routing mode - drive, truck, bicycle, walk or transit

parameters.name: waypoints
parameters.description: List of two or more lat,lon coordinates, separated by the pipe symbol \"|\"

constraints.format: List of two or more lat,lon coordinates, separated by the pipe symbol "|"
